mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( user_idx , game_idx , board_idx , quantity ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{gameIdx}, #{boardIdx}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.idx, a.user_idx AS userIdx, a.game_idx As gameIdx, a.quantity, b.title AS gameTitle, b.price AS price, (price * quantity) AS cost FROM cart a INNER JOIN game b ON a.game_idx = b.idx INNER JOIN member c ON a.user_idx = c.idx WHERE a.user_idx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY a.idx DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price * quantity), 0) AS cost FROM cart a inner join game b on a.game_idx = b.idx WHERE a.user_idx = #{userIdx}
